guild.description:
A free-speech haven to post dank christian memes away from crazy mods and Reddit drama.

ALL Christian memes are welcome! 

Rules:

1) **Memes must be about Christianity:** Off-topic posts will be kicked

2) **Don't be a Moron:** May result in a 3 minute temp-ban and the red hammer of *shame*, plus we will make fun of you.
   
3) **No Heresy/Blasphemy:** This is the only thing you can get perma-banned.


Related guilds: +veggietales_memes
guild.description_html:
A free-speech haven to post dank christian memes away from crazy mods and Reddit drama.

Rules:

  2. Don't be a Moron: May result in a 3 minute temp-ban and the red hammer of shame, plus we will make fun of you.

  3. No Heresy/Blasphemy: This is the only thing you can get perma-banned.

Related guilds: +Veggietales_memes
guild.name: DankChristianMemes

parent.body: I would go back to church but the man won't let me.

body:
"When you walk with the Lord you're never alone" as they always say.

The problem is Church is more than just my relationship with Jesus. Church is also about my relationship with the community, with the other men and women who share my faith.

body:
“Be strong and of a good courage, fear not, nor be afraid of them: for the LORD thy God, he it is that doth go with thee; he will not fail thee, nor forsake thee.”

Blessed be the Name of the Lord of lords.
body_html:
“Be strong and of a good courage, fear not, nor be afraid of them: for the LORD thy God, he it is that doth go with thee; he will not fail thee, nor forsake thee.”

Blessed be the Name of the Lord of lords.
